ygData.subject: Re: Band of rodcet life
ygData.msgSnippet: Not as bad as me, I KOS from East Karana onwards.......
ygData.messageBody:
Not as bad as me, I KOS from East Karana onwards.......

hans ng wrote:

> From: hans ng <nahemah@...>
>
> doh me kos in qeynos and been killin druids and trees
>
> Diablo wrote:
> >
> > From: "Diablo" <diablo99@...>
> >
> > This is an easy quest that can get you a great ring for pure casters except
> > for Necromancers. First of all you must get your faction to amiable with the
> > Temple of Life. I did this by giving Lashun Novashine 2 bone chips at a time
> > and paying him 2 gp for a cure disease.(Faction can be raised by killing
> > Putrid Skeletons in South Karana or by performing the blessed oil quest as
> > well as donating 2gp to Lashun) Once your faction is amiable you can do the
> > quest. Talk to Enic Rulkin by the Temple of Life Pool within Qeynos (he is
> > usually glitched and is swimming in the water by the Koalindl fish). He will
> > tell you of a problem that he has. It seems that Frostbite (McMannus's pet
> > dog in West Karanas) has eaten a Koalindl fish. Enic must get the corpse
> > back because even the fish's corpse is still considered to be holy. Here is
> > the trick... instead of killing Frostbite, which may be too high level to
> > kill and not always drop the fish corpse, simply create a level 1 character
> > with your friend doing the same (Shadow Knights are the best for this
> > because of Harm Touch) and go into the pool by the Temple of Life and kill a
> > Koalindl. The Koalindl will usually drop its scales. Now log out the level 1
> > character and loot the fish with your real character. I thought that this
> > would be the best way to do the quest, otherwise you would lose faction with
> > the Temple of Life if you kill the Koalindl Fish with your true character.
> > (To be safe, gate out of the zone and come back in before you do the next
> > step. One has been killed for simply looting the corpse) Now simply give the
> > Koalindl Fish Scales to Enic Rulkin, and if he cons amiable, you may get the
> > Band of Rodcet Nife. The quest booby prize is Prayer Beads.
> >
> > Original Quest submitted by Mideon of Cazic-Thule
> > Added info from Dextar ShadoWalker and
> > Ororo of Mithaniel Marr
> >
> > Taken from http://www.graffe.com
> >
> > Band of Rodcet Nife stats: Lore Nodrop 3int 10mana
> > which means it is better than a platinum rose engagement ring 4int, unless
> > you are level 50 then they are equal.
> >
> > Good luck,
> >
> > Mazy
> > Prexus
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: hans ng <nahemah@...>
> > To: eq <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Wednesday, November 10, 1999 1:32 AM
> > Subject: [sg-everquest] Band of rodcet life
> >
> > > From: hans ng <nahemah@...>
> > >

> > > fesse tell me info halfway then countdown her log out already so folks
> > > help me out here i cant seem to find the info on the quest to get the
> > > band.any knows wat i must do?
> > >
> > > short and lovin it(so long as got 1 long thing can already)
